__getitem__(specie) → MixtureItem[source]

specie: str / Molecule / int

Get the data relative to molecule in the mixture

-> If str: checking for molecule matching the name -> If Molecule: checking for specie -> If int: checing for entry following the order

Returns:

dataclass for data of specie in mixture.

Return type:

MixtureItem

Return the sum of mass fractions of specie in the composition (should add to 1).

Return the sum of mole fractions of specie in the composition (should add to 1).

dilute(dilutingMix: Mixture, dilutionFract: float, fracType: str = 'mass')[source]
dilutingMix: Mixture/Molecule

Diluting mixture

dilutionFract: float

mass/mole fraction of the dilutant mixture with respect to the overall mixture.

fracType: str (“mass” or “mole”)

Type of dilution, if mass fraction or mole fraction based.

Dilute the mixture with a second mixture, given the mass/mole fraction of the dilutant mixture with respect to the overall mixture.

extract(specieList)[source]
specieList: list<Molecule>

List of specie to extract

Extract a submixture from a list of specie. Raises ValueError if a Molecule is not found in mixture

removeZeros() → Mixture[source]

Remove Molecules with too low mass and mole fraction (Mixture._decimalPlaces).

Returns:

self

Return type:

Mixture

subtractMixture(mix: Mixture) → tuple[float, Mixture][source]

Finds the maximum sub-mixture with composition ‘mix’ in this. Then returns a tuple with (yMix, remainder) which are the mass-fraction of mixture ‘mix’ in this and the remaining mixture once ‘mix’ is removed.

Parameters:

mix (Mixture) – Mixture to subtract from this

Returns:

couple (yMix, remainder)

Return type:

tuple[float,Mixture]

mixture: list<mixture>

List of mixtures to be blended

composition: list<float>

List of mass/mole fractions for the blending

Type of blending (mass/mole fraction-based)

Blends together a group of mixtures.
